my PC type service in Korea we called it Network and it was a freemium model it

From my perspective as someone who was in Korean doing startups in Korea um

we're very young it's actually very difficult to be young and starting
a company because you're breaking a lot of barriers there there's a hierarchy of age there's hierarchy of titles it's

you have to learn all those things you have to learn about and it's not you know again there's some good things

learning about the working culture is different I mean I'm sure a lot of people have talked about stories of

what that means that the approach to strategic Investments is very different as if you take money from Samsung you're
